Delhi.name: Central Delhi
Delhi.description: Known for Connaught Place, administrative buildings, and heritage sites.

Delhi.name: East Delhi
Delhi.description: Residential and commercial area, with major markets and local attractions.

Delhi.name: New Delhi
Delhi.description: Capital city, houses Parliament, Rashtrapati Bhavan, and diplomatic areas.

Delhi.name: North Delhi
Delhi.description: Historic district with universities and old Delhi landmarks.

Delhi.name: North East Delhi
Delhi.description: Residential and industrial mix with cultural diversity.

Delhi.name: North West Delhi
Delhi.description: Residential and commercial hubs, famous for local markets.

Delhi.name: Shahdara
Delhi.description: Known for shopping areas, old heritage, and connectivity to NCR.

Delhi.name: South Delhi
Delhi.description: Upscale residential area with shopping malls, embassies, and cultural sites.

Delhi.name: South East Delhi
Delhi.description: Residential and commercial district with cultural landmarks.

Delhi.name: South West Delhi
Delhi.description: Mix of urban and rural areas, includes major institutions and residential colonies.

Delhi.name: West Delhi
Delhi.description: Industrial and residential district with markets and local commerce.
